[Pack Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=2794) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

You were taught how to hunt as part of a pack. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75), and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid you.

<title level="2">Pack Hunter leads to...</title>
[Pack Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=2798)
